abilities.name: Soak Up
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may take up to 2 {G} Energy cards attached to your other Pokémon and attach them to Erika’s Bellsprout. This power can’t be used if Erika’s Bellsprout is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Stretch Vine
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon, and this attack does 10 damage to it. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
